3.Pros: McDonalds was a great starter job. It afforded me the opportunity to work while in high school and develop an introductory skill set. I would recommend it to almost anyone looking for a part time job.
3.Cons: It might not be what you are looking for if you need a long term steady employment opportunity that will develop skills beyond what most would consider introductory. the pay is minimal but its representative of the work and required skill or aptitude.

4.Pros: This would be a great position for a 15 year old looking for work and is still in high school good for someone looking for extra money
4.Cons: It could mess with your school work and hours of community service
